languages.text: "А затем Простор Коронус вспыхнул. Пришлось ускорить операцию и ввести военное положение в секторе. Врата Паутины, которыми пользовались воины Иремерисс, были уничтожены, база на Кетца Темере — разгромлена. Оттуда я эвакуировал половину Ярма, собранную Тервантьясом, но не успел забрать вторую половину с Ефрата-II".

"And then the Koronus Expanse was engulfed in flame. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."
languages.original_text: "А затем Простор Коронус вспыхнул. Пришлось ускорить операцию и ввести военное положение в секторе. Врата Паутины, которыми пользовались воины Иремерисс, были уничтожены, база на Кетца Темере — разгромлена. Оттуда я эвакуировал половину Ярма, собранную Тервантьясом, но не успел забрать вторую половину с Ефрата-II".

traits.locale_text: "And then Koronus Expanse went up in flames. We had to hasten our operation and to declare martial law in the sector. The Webway Gate that Yremeriss' warriors had been using was destroyed, and the Quetza Temer's base crushed. I evacuated one half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from the Eufrates II."

"And then Koronus Expanse went up in flames. We had to hasten our operation and to declare martial law in the sector. The Webway Gate that Yremeriss' warriors had been using was destroyed, and the Quetza Temer's base crushed. I evacuated one half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from the Eufrates II."

"And then the Koronus Expanse went up in flames. We had to rush our operation and declare sectorwide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeriss' warriors had been using was destroyed and the Quetza Temer's base crushed. I evacuated one half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from the Eufrates II."

"And then the Koronus Expanse went up in flames. We had to rush our operation and declare sectorwide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeriss' warriors had been using was destroyed and the Quetza Temer's base crushed. I evacuated one half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from the Eufrates II."

"And then the Koronus Expanse went up in flames. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."

"And then the Koronus Expanse was engulfed in flame. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."

languages.text: « Ensuite, les Étendues de Koronus se sont embrasées. J'ai dû précipiter l'opération et déclarer la loi martiale dans tout le secteur. Le portail sur la Toile que les guerriers d'Yremeryss utilisaient a été détruit et la base de Quetza Temer, anéantie. J'ai évacué la moitié du Joug que Tervantias avait terminée, mais il était trop tard pour récupérer l'autre moitié sur Euphrate-II. »
languages.original_text: "And then the Koronus Expanse was engulfed in flame. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: « Ensuite, les Étendues de Koronus se sont embrasées. J'ai dû précipiter l'opération et déclarer la loi martiale dans tout le secteur. Le portail sur la Toile que les guerriers d'Yremeryss utilisaient a été détruit et la base de Quetza Temer, anéantie. J'ai évacué la moitié du Joug que Tervantias avait terminée, mais il était trop tard pour récupérer l'autre moitié sur Euphrate-II. »

languages.text: «Y entonces, la Extensión de Koronus estalló en llamas. Tuve que acelerar la operación y declarar la ley marcial en todo el sector. El Portal de la Telaraña que utilizaban los guerreros de Yremeryss fue destruido y las instalaciones de Quetza Temer quedaron arrasadas. Evacué la mitad del Yugo que Tervantias había completado, pero no tuve tiempo de recuperar la segunda mitad de Eufrates II».
languages.original_text: "And then the Koronus Expanse was engulfed in flame. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: «Y, después, la Extensión de Koronus estalló en llamas. Tuvimos que apresurar la operación y declarar la ley marcial en todo el sector. El portal de la Telaraña que usaban los guerreros de Yremeriss fue destruido y la base de Quetza Temer quedó arrasada. Evacué la mitad del Yugo que Tervantias tenía lista, pero no llegué a tiempo de recuperar la segunda mitad de Eufrates II».

languages.text: “那个时候，整个科罗努斯扩区变成了一片火海。我们不得不加快计划，宣布对整个星区实施戒严。我们摧毁了伊芮梅莉斯的战士一直在使用的网道门，还摧毁了格扎尔特默的设施。同时，我回收了特万提亚斯建造了一半的圣枷，但我们的动作太迟了，没来得及前往欧夫拉茨二号星回收另外一半。”
languages.original_text: "And then the Koronus Expanse was engulfed in flame. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: “那个时候，整个科罗努斯扩区陷入火海之中。我们不得不加快计划，宣布对整个星区实施戒严。我们摧毁了伊芮梅莉斯的战士一直在使用的网道门，还摧毁了格扎尔特默的基地。同时，我回收了特万提亚斯建造了一半的圣枷，但我们的动作太迟了，没来得及前往欧夫拉茨二号星回收另外一半。”

languages.text: "Und dann wurde die Koronus-Ausdehnung vom Feuer erfasst. Ich musste die Operation übereilt ausführen und im gesamten Sektor das Kriegsrecht ausrufen. Das Netzportal, das Yremeryss' Krieger verwendet hatten, wurde zerstört, und die Anlage auf Quetza Temer abgerissen. Ich habe eine Hälfte des Jochs evakuiert, die Tervantias fertiggestellt hatte, doch es war zu spät, um die zweite Hälfte von Eufrates II zu bergen."
languages.original_text: "And then the Koronus Expanse was engulfed in flame. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: "Und dann ist die Koronus-Ausdehnung in Flammen aufgegangen. Wir mussten unsere Operation übereilt ausführen und im gesamten Sektor das Kriegsrecht ausrufen. Das Netzportal, das Yremeryss' Krieger verwendet hatten, wurde zerstört, und die Basis auf Quetza Temer wurde ausgelöscht. Ich habe eine Hälfte des Jochs evakuiert, die Tervantias fertiggestellt hatte, doch es war zu spät, um die zweite Hälfte von der Eufrates II zu bergen."

languages.text: 「そしてコロヌス・エクスパンスは炎に包まれた。私は作戦を急ぎ、宙域全体に戒厳令を布告しなければならなかった。イレメリスの戦士たちが使っていた網辻門は破壊され、ケツァ・テメルの施設は焼き尽くされた。私はテルヴァンティアスが完成させたヨークの片割れを避難させたが、ユーフラテス・IIから残りの半分を回収するには遅すぎた」
languages.original_text: "And then the Koronus Expanse was engulfed in flame. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: 「そしてコロヌス・エクスパンスは炎に包まれた。私は作戦を急ぎ、宙域全体に戒厳令を布告しなければならなかった。イレメリスの戦士たちが使っていた網辻門は破壊され、ケツァ・テメルの施設は焼き尽くされた。私はテルヴァンティアスが完成させたヨークの片割れを避難させたが、ユーフラテス・IIから残りの半分を回収するには遅すぎた」

languages.text: "Sonra Koronus Enginliği alevlere boğuldu. Operasyonu hızlandırıp sektör genelinde sıkıyönetim ilan etmek zorunda kaldım. Yremeryss'in savaşçılarının kullandığı Ağyol Geçidi yok edildi ve Quetza Temer'deki tesis yerle bir oldu. Tervantias'ın tamamladığı Boyunduruk'un yarısını tahliye etmeyi başardım ama diğer yarısını Eufrates II'den almak için çok geç kaldım."
languages.original_text: "And then the Koronus Expanse was engulfed in flame. I had to rush the operation and declare sector-wide martial law. The Webway Gate that Yremeryss's warriors had been using was destroyed and the facility on Quetza Temer razed. I evacuated the half of the Yoke that Tervantias had completed, but was too late to retrieve the second half from Eufrates II."
